programme.title: Swordfish
programme.desc: A spy (John Travolta) working for the CIA forces a computer hacker (Hugh Jackman), who was recently released from prison, to help steal unused government funds.

programme.title: Romeo Must Die
programme.desc: While seeking vengeance for his brother's murder, a former Hong Kong policeman (Jet Li) falls for his foe's daughter (Aaliyah).

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Near the end of the Gulf War, soldiers use a map that may lead them to gold that Saddam Hussein stole from Kuwait.

programme.title: The Skyhawk
programme.desc: Master Wong and Fatty face chaos in Thailand, mentoring a fiery street fighter, while a local crime boss escalates the conflict.

programme.title: The Bad Bunch
programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran (Greydon Clark) encounters racial hostility when he attempts to deliver a medal to a dead soldier's family.

programme.title: The Black Six
programme.desc: Righteous biker Bubba (Gene Washington) and his five war buddies go south to avenge his slain brother.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guests are Another Bad Creation, Gerardo, and comedian Ralph Harris.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guests are Too $hort, Elisa Fiorillo, and comedian Joe Torre.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guests are En Vogue, Take 6, and comedian Lenny Varnedoe.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guests are Father MC, Peabo Bryson, Regina Belle, and comedians Kevin Lee and Bill Bellamy.

programme.title: Firehouse
programme.desc: A rookie (Richard Roundtree) and a white bigot (Vince Edwards) clash in a city fire department faced with arson.

programme.title: He Watches Over Me
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a vicious assault, a woman holds the fate of her attacker in her hands.

programme.title: Favorite Son
programme.desc: Twin brothers in a gospel group struggle to find balance of life, love, faith, and religion while under the strict rule of their father, who is the reverend of a megachurch.

programme.title: Liam White: The Forgettable Life of Liam White
programme.desc: An uninspired novelist begins a journey of self-reflection and reconciliation when he learns that his cancer has returned.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Cliff is suing Miles for half of the security deposit from renting an Airbnb together; Cliff claims Miles caused damage and it came out of the security deposit they both paid; Miles claims Cliff fully participated, so they should share the expense.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Nick is suing his ex-girlfriend for canceling a job interview since his boss would have been a single woman.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Sara is suing her sister, Lauren, for half of their mother's estate.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: Rodger Davis is killed by a gunshot; Carol Taylor is killed by a vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: Nilo Vila was gunned down at his Hialeah apartment during an attempted arm robbery; Norman West found murdered near an alley.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A criminal psychologist (Halle Berry) awakens to find herself confined in a penitentiary, accused of murdering her husband (Charles S. Dutton).

programme.title: Queen of the Damned
programme.desc: The vampire Lestat (Stuart Townsend) awakens after 100 years, becomes a rock star and unites with a female counterpart (Aaliyah).
